items.sentence: I don't like meat. I prefer a vegetarian diet.
The story of Tom and Mary is very interesting.
Democracy is the dictatorship of the majority.
British people are used to standing in queues.
Tom's garden is about the same size as Mary's.
Tom said he didn't want to sleep in the attic.
Tom told me that he was really good at tennis.
Tom said that he didn't want to miss the show.
Tom says that he doesn't remember what he did.
Tom says that he doesn't feel like doing that.
I don't know what the word 'impossible' means.
If you wear that, you're going to look stupid.
If you don't go to bed soon, it'll be morning.
There are people who read magazines on trains.
Red wine isn't traditionally served with fish.
Am I the only one who thinks this isn't right?
Tom admitted what he said earlier wasn't true.
I've lost three kilos in the last three weeks.
I only have three hundred dollars in the bank.
Did you know Tom wanted to become a carpenter?
